original: 《三國演義》虛構之人物，為烏戈國王兀突骨部將，和土安率三萬藤甲兵迎戰蜀軍，曾一度挫敗魏延，但最終在盤蛇谷被諸葛亮設火計殲滅。
text: The fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" is the Bone General of the Ugo King Wutu. He and Tu'an led 30,000 cane soldiers to fight against the Shu army. He once defeated Wei Yan, but was eventually wiped out by Zhuge Liang in Panshe Valley.
